name: Merry Jelly Christmas
description:
Merry Jelly Christmas is a Christmas-themed game about Jelly and The Bakery (twitch.tv/jellydoughnut__). This is my (MarineArti's) entry for the #MerryJellyChristmas contest!

The game can be played in the browser, but I highly recommend downloading it for a better experience! This was a two-week project so I couldn't polish the game as much as I wanted. I am aware there are some bugs (that probably won't be fixed).

Atention! If you have a headache, nausea, or any motion sickness symptom, please, stop playing immediatly.

Controls:

- WASD to walk;

- Space to jump;

- Shift (hold) to run;

- E to interact with NPC's.
